titles.title: Presidential Accountability Act
To amend the Ethics in Government Act of 1978 to require the President and Vice President to divest themselves of certain financial conflicts of interest, and for other purposes.
Presidential Accountability Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Reform.

term.name: Government ethics and transparency, public corruption
Presidents and presidential powers, Vice Presidents

bill.summary:
Presidential Accountability Act
This bill requires the President and Vice President to divest all financial interests that pose a conflict of interest and to make certain disclosures regarding any business enterprise in which the President, Vice President, or a close family member has a significant financial interest.
